summary: Project now includes an admin panel restricted to a single admin account (yug553496@gmail.com) with admin-only controls for subscriptions, payments/discounts, and user session management.
architectural_notes: Admin authorization is determined by logged-in email equality check (yug553496@gmail.com); non-admin users must not see admin UI/routes.
Admin panel does not prompt for an additional password once the admin email is authenticated (Option B).

existing_features.title: Restrict Admin Panel visibility so it is not shown to any user unless they are logged in as the admin account identified by the email "yug553496@gmail.com" (Option B: no extra admin password screen).

Remove the admin password verification flow from the Admin Panel access path so that admin access is granted solely by being authenticated as the admin account; update all user-facing copy to match (no references to entering an admin password).

Ensure Admin Panel supports these admin actions for individual users: activate a subscription plan for a specific user; add/manage payment methods/payment options; create/manage discount options; and kick out a specific user.

new_feature_requests.summary: Restrict admin panel visibility/access to only the account logged in with yug553496@gmail.com (remove admin panel for all other users)
No additional password required to access/use the admin panel once logged in as the admin email (Option B)
Admin can activate subscription plan for individual users
Admin can add/manage payment methods/payment options
Admin can kick out (force logout/remove session) any user

Enforce server-side admin authorization for all admin operations and all admin-only data access, ensuring non-admin callers cannot access admin queries or mutations even if they manipulate the frontend.

projectName: Restrict Admin Panel to Single Admin Account and Remove Admin Password Prompt
